code: @Override public void setBeanFactory(BeanFactory beanFactory) {     if (beanFactory instanceof AutowireCapableBeanFactory) {         this.beanFactory = (AutowireCapableBeanFactory) beanFactory.     } }
public void destroy(T handler) {     if (this.beanFactory != null) {         this.beanFactory.destroyBean(handler).     } }
public Class<? extends T> getHandlerType() {     return this.handlerType. }

public T getHandler() {     if (this.beanFactory != null) {         return this.beanFactory.createBean(this.handlerType).     } else {         return BeanUtils.instantiateClass(this.handlerType).     } }
